description: The Argo Cable Car is a spectacular urban cable way system that connects downtown Batumi with the Anuria Mountain entertainment complex, 256 meters above sea level. Operating since 2013, this modern Doppelmayr cable car system has transported over two million passengers, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the Black Sea, Batumi cityscape, and surrounding mountains during the 10-minute journey. The complex is named after the mythical ship Argo, on which Jason and the Argonauts sailed to Colchis to retrieve the Golden Fleece, celebrating Georgia's connection to ancient Greek mythology.
highlights: 2,586-meter cable car route reaching 256 meters elevation on Anuria Mountain
20 eight-seat gondolas with capacity for 500 passengers per hour
10-minute scenic journey offering 360-degree panoramic views of Batumi, Black Sea, and mountains
Entertainment complex at summit featuring digital museum with immersive 360-degree art installations
Joyroom attraction with mirror mazes, selfie spots, private jet simulator, and interactive experiences
Observation deck with sweeping vistas perfect for photography
Multiple dining options including restaurants, cafes, wine bar, and outdoor deck cafe
Traditional Georgian folklore evenings in summer (8 PM) featuring UNESCO-recognized dances, songs, and martial arts
Shopping units offering wine and local souvenirs
Modern Doppelmayr cable car system ensuring smooth and comfortable ride
tips: Operating hours: 10:00 AM to 11:00 PM daily
Ticket prices: Adults 30 GEL, Children 5-12 years 7 GEL, Under 5 years 10 GEL (round-trip included)
Tickets valid for 6 months from purchase date
Beware of taxi drivers and scammers providing false pricing information
Cable car may be suspended during strong winds for safety, but operates in light rain
Best time to visit: sunset hours for spectacular views of the city lights and sea
Plan to spend 1-2 hours at the top station to fully explore the entertainment complex
Bring a camera for the observation deck - the views are exceptional
Try Georgian wine at the wine bar while enjoying the mountain views
Check folklore evening schedule in summer for cultural performances at 8 PM
Lower station located on Bako Street in central Batumi - easily accessible
vibe: Modern adventure meets cultural entertainment with spectacular mountain-top views. The Argo Cable Car offers a thrilling aerial experience combined with family-friendly attractions, authentic Georgian cultural performances, and world-class panoramic vistas. The journey itself is an attraction, gliding smoothly above the cityscape toward the entertainment complex that blends digital art, traditional culture, dining, and observation platforms. It's a must-visit destination that appeals to families, couples, photographers, and culture enthusiasts, providing both excitement and relaxation in a stunning natural setting. The mythological Argo theme adds a layer of storytelling that connects visitors to Georgia's ancient heritage and the legend of the Golden Fleece.
